actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, to encourage the use of recycled oil.

summary.text: Removes the manufacturer's excise tax, under the Internal Revenue Code, on recycled oil. Provides that users of recycled oil will be provided with a tax refund (presently limited to off-highway users of lubricating oil). (Amends 26 U.S.C. 4091, 6424(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, to encourage the use of recycled oil.
